verses.name: Mark 11:9
verses.text: And they that went before, and they that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord:

verses.name: Mark 11:10
verses.text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David, that cometh in the name of the Lord: Hosanna in the highest.

verses.name: Mark 11:11
verses.text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem, and into the temple: and when he had looked round about upon all things, and now the eventide was come, he went out unto Bethany with the twelve.

verses.name: Mark 11:12
verses.text: And on the morrow, when they were come from Bethany, he was hungry:
